text: William Clarence 'Billy' Holzrichter (January 1, 1922 - March 23, 2005) was a male United States international table tennis player. He won a silver medal at the 1947 World Table Tennis Championships in the men's team event and a bronze medal in the mixed doubles with Davida Hawthorn. He was inducted into the USA Table Tennis Hall of Fame in 1980. Holzrichter died on March 23, 2005 at the age of 83. title: William Holzrichter
